title: Consumer Story Ideas
description: A list of potential investigative stories related to consumer safety and protection, including teeth whitening kiosks, eye glasses/Lasik, med spas, liposuction, hair removal, nail/pedicure, meth houses, grocery store returns, handicap parking, magic jack, fleecing the flock, tanning salons, disabled at the pump, tasers, car cloning, consumer crime, radon levels, unlicensed and practicing, predatory lending, and lube jobs.
